DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate performance DAILIES® TOTAL1™ first time contact lens wearer .
DOC.brief_title: Performance Evaluation DAILIES® TOTAL1™ First Time Contact Lens Wearers
DOC.criteria: Sign Informed Consent . No previous contact lens experience attempt try contact lenses ( neophyte ) . Willing wear study lenses least 8 hour day least 5 day week . Use spectacle lenses vision correction . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . 45 year old . Prior wear experience rigid soft contact lens . Systemic ocular disease disorder would negatively affect conduct outcome study . History ocular surgery/trauma within last six month . Pregnant nursing woman . Participation ophthalmic drug device clinical trial within 30 day enrollment . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
